Html:
Hi!

I'm trying to write a kind of emulator and I must create a PCM stream and generate the sound it produced 50 times per second.

What is the correct way to do this in NAudio? (I was using DynamicSoundEffectInstance in XNA but now it's not an option)

Thanks a lot,
Kak
I'm not sure exactly what you are asking. Are you trying to repeat a short sound 50 times a second?
